page.title: 11WIVENHOE 70 YEARS AGO
page.content: reached Standard 7. You left school at 14. There were not many jobs. You were lucky if you got a job. I took a job as a bookbinder. {Sharon:}Did you like it better then or now? {Mrs.Allen:}Well, I think its much nicer now. You have a much better time than we did. On Fridays we used to go into the hall and we used to have Folk Dancing which Mrs. Grasby taught us, with the maypole. We weaved these lovely patterns with all different coloured tapes and then every year we used to go to Wilson Marriage which has just burnt down. We used to go there for a great rally of all the schools. {Sarah:} How many of you lived in your first house? {Mrs.Allen:}My Grandmother,my Mum, my Dad, my Sister and an Aunt until my
